text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with good old-fashioned pancakes

old-fashioned pancakes so easy and here

and then we're gonna sift that now you

here kind of important so I want you to

quickly okay so I popped that egg yolk

five minutes later that cold milk will
have solidified that butter and it just
won't mix in as well so make sure you
have all your stuff handy and like I
said you're just gonna whisk that until
it comes together should look like that

the bubbles will tell you first

so depending on your flame depending on

should be perfect once you flip them the
other side goes a little quicker so if
the first I took 2-3 minutes maybe the
